articles.title: Latest Articles
articles.subtitle: Sharing knowledge and insights from my development journey

article1.title: Shrinking Your SPA's Entry Bundle: The Key to Faster Loads
article1.description: Learn how to optimize your Single Page Application's bundle size to achieve faster load times and better user experience through code splitting and lazy loading techniques.

article2.title: Building a Feature Catalog with Storybook and MSW
article2.description: Discover how to create a comprehensive feature catalog using Storybook and Mock Service Worker (MSW) for better development workflow and team collaboration.

home.latestProjectDesc: Banque Centrale de la République de Guinée
home.projectDescription: Developed a comprehensive corporate banking platform for the Central Bank of Guinea. Implemented advanced React Query integration with Formio.js, including custom fetch function overrides and AI-powered form generation capabilities.
home.projectFeature1: Built corporate banking interfaces using React and React Query
home.projectFeature2: Overrode Formio.js fetch function to integrate with React Query
home.projectFeature3: Implemented AI-powered form generation using Formio.js

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A passionate Frontend Developer with over 5 years of experience creating exceptional digital experiences
about.description1: I'm Ayoub Sayah, a versatile Frontend Developer based in Sousse, Tunisia. With over 5 years of experience, I specialize in building high-performance, user-focused web applications for banking, microfinance, and eCommerce platforms.
about.description2: I'm highly proficient in React, Vue, Angular, and state management tools like Redux and React Query. My passion lies in solving complex challenges and driving project success through innovative solutions.
about.description3: I love collaborating with global teams to deliver responsive, accessible, and scalable web applications that make a real impact on users' lives.
